text: How can I remove MKL from Base.loaded_modules?  When I remove it with Pkg it still appears there.

elements.text: How can I remove MKL from Base.loaded_modules?  When I remove it with Pkg it still appears there.

text: MKL.jl rebuilds the system image to use MKL, which is destructive in that it doesn't revert when you remove MKL.jl. You might need to reinstall julia or rebuild the system image. <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/devdocs/sysimg/>

elements.text: MKL.jl rebuilds the system image to use MKL, which is destructive in that it doesn't revert when you remove MKL.jl. You might need to reinstall julia or rebuild the system image.
